MODER¶

Molecular Outlier DEtection from Rna-seq data¶

Introduction¶

MODER(Molecular Outlier DEtection from Rna-seq data) is a bioinformatic pipeline to detect aberrant molecular phenotypes (including gene expression, alternative splicing, and allele specific expression) among samples. MODER is maily built on python3 which is easy to use. Users only need to run one python command on prepared bam files, and can get all three kinds of outliers automatically.

Installation¶

MODER can be download from PyPI. and read installation page for more information

Source Code¶

The source code of MODER can be found at https://github.com/Xu-Dong/MODER/tree/singleTissue.
